name: One With Many Legs
desc:
Always appears out of nowhere.
Scary at night.

name: Sir Spikes Alot
desc:
I don't like apples.
Where'd you heard that?

name: Silverback Gorilla
desc:
Be careful around this one!
It carries the mighty "Unga Bunga".

name: Nimble Knight
desc:
They used to be an adventurer like you.
Then they took an arrow to the knee.

name: The Ultimate Devil
desc:
It always says something like...
"Your soul shall be mine!"

name: Human Impostor
desc:
Something seems a bit off.
*clenches buttcheeks*
